boardgame.name: Bullfrogs
Король кувшинок
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Just as water retains no constant shape, in warfare there are no constant conditions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;Sun Tzu_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Weapons clash, water splashes and the booming battle cries of armored bullfrogs ring out across the moonlit swamp. Amphibian armies leap from lily pad to lily pad in their desperate struggle to win control of the pond._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Suddenly, a shout of triumph rises up. Enough warriors have finally entered battle on a lily pad to dominate the fight and assure victory for their side. Overloaded, the lily pad sinks into the swamp._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Frogs scatter from the sinking lily pad to the surrounding ones, coming to aid their allies or sabotage their foes, their weight causing the lily pads to drift away across the cold, glittering water. The winning commander must understand the ripple effects of every move, and avoid acting to win a single battle at the cost of losing the war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Bullfrogs, 2-4 players ages 8+ take control of warring factions of frogs and fight over lily pads in a pond over the course of 20-40 minutes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Bullfrogs Review with the Game Boy Geek
The Long View: Game of Thrones
What Did You Play this Week Podcast Thing Week 79

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is for item won at auction.

Thunderworks Games (TWK1000) In Bullfrogs, 2-4 players ages 8+ over 30 minutes, take control of warring frog factions and battle for lily pads by deploying, sabotaging and jumping units on an ever-changing battlefield. Position your troops on the safety of the log card it the center of the pond or setup a large cascade to swing the tide of war in your favor. Choose your tactics through cunning and wit to lead your frog battalion to victory!
For Dimmendarkgirl - won in auction.

Choose your tactics through cunning and wit to lead your frog battalion to victory!

For user AmnNate, winner at ABT auction.
